quote: One of my best days on a bicycle

Last Saturday we participated in Tuscany's Nova Eroica Gravel Race... We managed to make the initial front group of 20 or so which formed in the first km and spent that first hour before the first actual timed gravel sector of Monte Sante Marie with the lead group.
The festival atmosphere of the event's start/finish town of Buonconvento is great to walk around the day before the event as well as after the race.

There is a big party at the finish line, with tasty food and a festive environment where you can 'relax' and share your experience with others. All in all a wonderful and inclusive day out on the bike.
And to make the experience even more memorable, an exclusive seaside refreshment stop will welcome you along the way.
